notes: Basic sequencing method to obtain whole-genome DNA sequences.
Basic sequencing method to obtain exon sequences; Effective in detection of exonic mutation and study of Mendelian disease

paper_title: Genome-wide profiles of STAT1 DNA association using chromatin immunoprecipitation and massively parallel sequencing.
notes: Basic sequencing method for TF binding and histone modification profiles.

seq_fullname: chromatin immunoprecipitation (ChIP) with lambda exonuclease digestion (exo) followed by high-throughput sequencing
paper_title: Comprehensive genome-wide protein-DNA interactions detected at single-nucleotide resolution.
notes: Uses exonuclease to increase resolution on top of ChIP-seq; Can reach single basepair accuracy to get transcription factor binding sites.

seq_fullname: ultra-low-input micrococcal nuclease-based native ChIP and sequencing
paper_title: An ultra-low-input native ChIP-seq protocol for genome-wide profiling of rare cell populations.
notes: Uses as few cells as ~1000 cells to measure transcription binding sites.

paper_title: reChIP-seq reveals widespread bivalency of H3K4me3 and H3K27me3 in CD4(+) memory T cells.
notes: Measures co-localization of transcription facors (or histone) binding profile. The original paper measured co-localization of two histone modifications (H3K4me3 and H3K27me3).

paper_title: CETCh-seq: CRISPR epitope tagging ChIP-seq of DNA-binding proteins
notes: Uses CRISPR to engineer transcription factors lacking good antibodies, followed by ChIP-seq.

seq_fullname: selective microfluidics-based ligand enrichment followed by sequencing
paper_title: SMiLE-seq identifies binding motifs of single and dimeric transcription factors.
notes: Uses a semiautomated microfluidic platform to characterize transcription factor binding.

paper_title: ChEC-seq kinetics discriminates transcription factor binding sites by DNA sequence and shape in vivo
notes: Fuses MNase with the protein of interest and use calcium to control binding and measure dynamics.

paper_title: Ribose-seq: global mapping of ribonucleotides embedded in genomic DNA
notes: Maps location of ribonucleotides, which can be incorporated into DNA during eukaryotic DNA replication.

paper_title: Genome-wide analysis of human global and transcription-coupled excision repair of UV damage at single-nucleotide resolution
notes: Maps location of incisions caused by DNA repair.

paper_title: Genome-wide profiles of STAT1 DNA association using chromatin immunoprecipitation and massively parallel sequencing.
notes: Basic sequencing method for TF binding and histone modification profiles.
Basic sequencing method for DNA methylation quantification. See "Methyl-seq".

paper_title: Reduced representation bisulfite sequencing for comparative high-resolution DNA methylation analysis
notes: Enriches methylation fragments followed by bisulfite sequencing, reducing the cost.

paper_title: A Bayesian deconvolution strategy for immunoprecipitation-based DNA methylome analysis
notes: 100 300_base pair resolution {'link','https://www.nature.com/nature/journal/v466/n7303/full/nature09165.html'}.

paper_title: Whole-genome DNA methylation profiling using MethylCap-seq
notes: Based on capture of methylated DNA with the MBD domain of MeCP2; Uses a salt gradient to get DNA with different CpG densities.

paper_title: Distinct DNA methylation patterns characterize differentiated human embryonic stem cells and developing human fetal liver.
notes: Uses methyl-sensitive restriction enzymes

paper_title: Conserved role of intragenic DNA methylation in regulating alternative promoters.
notes: Can reach single CpG site resolution

paper_title: Oxidative bisulfite sequencing of 5-methylcytosine and 5-hydroxymethylcytosine.
notes: Can discriminate between 5mC and 5hmC

paper_title: Targeted and genome-scale strategies reveal gene-body methylation signatures in human cells.
notes: Utilizes HpaII sites

paper_title: Base-Resolution Analysis of 5-Hydroxymethylcytosine in the Mammalian Genome
notes: Maps location of 5hmC on the genome.

paper_title: Ultra-low-input, tagmentation-based whole-genome bisulfite sequencing
notes: Also called t-WGBS (tagmentation based whole genome bisulfite sequencing); Needs ~10 ng of input DNA,  which is >100 fold less than in conventional protocols of WGBS.

seq_fullname: Bisulfite sequencing of chromatin immunoprecipitated DNA
paper_title: Bisulfite sequencing of chromatin immunoprecipitated DNA (BisChIP-seq) directly informs methylation status of histone-modified DNA.
notes: Detects DNA methylated by histones through direct bisulfite sequencing of Polycomb H3K27me3-enriched DNA

paper_title: High-resolution mapping and characterization of open chromatin across the genome.
notes: Basic sequencing method for open chromatin profiling.

seq_fullname: Assay for Transposase-Accessible Chromatin with high throughput sequencing
paper_title: Transposition of native chromatin for fast and sensitive epigenomic profiling of open chromatin, DNA-binding proteins and nucleosome position
notes: Less cells required ; paired-end

seq_fullname: Formaldehyde-Assisted Isolation of Regulatory Elements and sequencing
paper_title: A map of open chromatin in human pancreatic islets.
notes: Uses formaldehyde to crosslink protein (e.g. histone)-bound DNA, leaving protein-free DNA fragments for sequencing.

paper_title: NicE-seq: high resolution open chromatin profiling.
notes: Requires low cell count to profile open chromatin. Uses DNA nicking enzyme Nt.CviPII.

paper_title: Mapping accessible chromatin regions using Sono-Seq
notes: Simple to perform along with ChIP-seq; notice that the DNA breakage pattern is different from DNase-seq.

paper_title: Multiplex single cell profiling of chromatin accessibility by combinatorial cellular indexing.
notes: Use combinatorial barcoding techniques to mark open chromatin from different single cells.

paper_title: Capturing chromosome conformation.
notes: Discovers interaction between two genomic regions

paper_title: Circular chromosome conformation capture (4C) uncovers extensive networks of epigenetically regulated intra- and interchromosomal interactions.
notes: Discovers interactions between a set of genomic regions with a fixed genomic region of interest.

paper_title: Chromosome Conformation Capture Carbon Copy (5C): a massively parallel solution for mapping interactions between genomic elements.
notes: Discovers interactions between a set of genomic regions with many genomic regions of interest ("many-to-many").

paper_title: Comprehensive mapping of long-range interactions reveals folding principles of the human genome
notes: Discoveres genome-wide interactions between any pairs of genomic regions.

seq_fullname: Chromatin Interaction Analysis by Paired-End Tag Sequencing
paper_title: An oestrogen-receptor-alpha-bound human chromatin interactome.
notes: Discoveres genome-wide interactions between any pairs of genomic regions, mediated by some protein.

paper_title: Mapping 3D genome architecture through in situ DNase Hi-C
notes: Can reach a higher effective resolution than traditional Hi-C

seq_fullname: ionizing radiation-induced spatially correlated cleavage of DNA with sequencing
paper_title: Variable chromatin structure revealed by in situspatially correlated DNA cleavage mapping
notes: Utilizes ionizing radiation to break DNA and sequencing the chomatin conformation; chromatin conformation structure at 50 500 bp scale

seq_fullname: MICROcoccal nuclease chromosome Conformation assay and sequencing
paper_title: Mapping Nucleosome Resolution Chromosome Folding in Yeast by Micro-C
notes: Nucleosome-resolution analysis of chromosome folding; Micrococcal nuclease is used instead of restriction enzymes to fragment chromatin; 1-200bp resolution

paper_title: Massively multiplex single-cell Hi-C
notes: Use combinatorial cellular indexing technique.

paper_title: Translocation capture sequencing: a method for high throughput mapping of chromosomal rearrangements.
notes: Measures genome-wide chromosomal rearrangements; Can discover recombination hotspots

paper_title: R-loop formation is a distinctive characteristic of unmethylated human CpG island promoters.
notes: Maps location of DNA-RNA hybrid (R-loops)

paper_title: High-resolution genome-wide mapping of the primary structure of chromatin.
notes: Basic sequencing method to map nucleosome locations. Utilizes micrococcal nuclease combined with ChIP-seq to map nucleosomes; Known to have GC-bias.

paper_title: A base pair resolution map of nucleosome positions in yeast
notes: Mapping nucleosome centers by site-specific chemical cleavage; Can reach base pair resolution of nucleosome locations; the histone H4 was introduced an amino acid mutation.

paper_title: MPE-seq, a new method for the genome-wide analysis of chromatin structure.
notes: Utilizes MPE-Fe(II) to cleave chromatin with minimal DNA sequence bias.

paper_title: Genome-wide mapping of nucleosome positioning and DNA methylation within individual DNA molecules
notes: Can measure nucleosome position and methylation from same set of DNA, using less than 1 million cells.

paper_title: Replication landscape of the human genome.
notes: Sequences purified Okazaki fragments at replication forks

seq_fullname: genome-wide, unbiased identification of DSBs enabled by sequencing
paper_title: GUIDE-seq enables genome-wide profiling of off-target cleavage by CRISPR-Cas nucleases.
notes: Useful to profile CRISPR off-target events

paper_title: Broad histone H3K4me3 domains in mouse oocytes modulate maternal-to-zygotic transition
notes: Recovers 85% of ENCODE peaks as few as 500 cells.

paper_title: RNA-Seq: a revolutionary tool for transcriptomics.
notes: Basic sequencing method for gene expression quantification.

paper_title: Extensive transcriptional heterogeneity revealed by isoform profiling
notes: Circularizing the beginning and end of transcripts for sequencing.

paper_title: Nascent transcript sequencing visualizes transcription at nucleotide resolution.
notes: Sequencing 3_ ends of nascent transcripts associated with RNA polymerase; Used engineered RNAPII elongating complex in yeast.

seq_fullname: Cap analysis gene expression with sequencing
paper_title: 5' end-centered expression profiling using cap-analysis gene expression and next-generation sequencing.
notes: Tags 5' end of mRNA to profile transcriptional start points; Also for promoter usage analysis

paper_title: Nascent RNA sequencing reveals widespread pausing and divergent initiation at human promoters.
notes: Sequences newly-synthesized RNA; resolution ~50bp

paper_title: Precise maps of RNA polymerase reveal how promoters direct initiation and pausing.
notes: Maps genome-wide distribution of transcriptionally engaged Pol II at base pair resolution; Utilizes the fact that Pol II accumulates immediately downstream of promoters.

seq_fullname: Chromatin Isolation by RNA Purification and sequencing
paper_title: Genomic maps of lincRNA occupancy reveal principles of RNA-chromatin interactions
notes: Maps interaction between non-coding RNA and chromatin; must design probes for specific lincRNAs

paper_title: Topology of the human and mouse m6A RNA methylomes revealed by m6A-seq.
notes: Also called MeRIPseq; Maps the m6A modification of RNA

paper_title: Genome-wide identification of Polycomb-associated RNAs by RIP-seq
notes: Captures RNA-protein complex; The RNA version of ChIP-seq.

paper_title: HITS-CLIP: panoramic views of protein-RNA regulation in living cells.
notes: HITS-CLIP, aka CLIP-seq; Maps protein-RNA binding sites, e.g., splicing factors;

seq_fullname: photoactivatable ribonucleoside enhanced cross-linking and immunoprecipitation
paper_title: Transcriptome-wide identification of RNA-binding protein and microRNA target sites by PAR-CLIP.
notes: Maps protein-RNA binding sites and microRNA-binding proteins.

paper_title: Genome-wide analysis in vivo of translation with nucleotide resolution using ribosome profiling.
notes: Profiles active translated mRNAs. Also called ribosome footprinting.

paper_title: Genome-wide mapping of RNA structure using nuclease digestion and high-throughput sequencing.
notes: Profile RNA structures utilizing enzymes that are single-stranded RNA or double-strand RNA specific

seq_fullname: selective 2'-hydroxyl acylation analyzed by primer extension (SHAPE) with sequencing
paper_title: Multiplexed RNA structure characterization with selective 2'-hydroxyl acylation analyzed by primer extension sequencing (SHAPE-Seq).
notes: Uses the chemical "1M7" to mark secondary structures of RNA, followed by sequencing.

paper_title: In vivo genome-wide profiling of RNA secondary structure reveals novel regulatory features.
notes: Uses the chemical dimethyl sulphate (DMS) to measure the difference of base-pairing caused by RNA secondary structure.

paper_title: Comprehensive single-cell transcriptional profiling of a multicellular organism.
notes: Use two-stage barcoding technique to mark RNA from different single cells
